text: Powell River is a city in the Canadian province of British Columbia. Powell River is in the northern part of the Sunshine Coast region. The population of Powell River was 13,943 in 2021. The mayor of Powell River is Ron Woznow. The historic townsite was designated as a National Historic Site of Canada in 1995. Powell River has an ice hockey team, the Powell River Kings which play in the British Columbia Hockey League. Powell River was named a "Cultural Capital of Canada" in 2004 because of the its strong arts and cultural programs. == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Cities in British Columbia
title: Powell River, British Columbia
